Name: Ancient Tower
About the game: WATCH OUT: THEY’RE COMING! Can YOU stop them before they reach Turrick? Enjoy the CARTOON GRAPHICS: reach every destination and enjoy colorful levels and goofy characters! Don’t get distracted: they might seem friendly… But they’re ready to take over the whole Kingdom! Play it STRATEGICALLY: kill ‘em all! Up your arsenal and upgrade your towers with archers, wizards, engineers, soldiers and much more at your disposal! Epic Features BUILD your TEAM with Heroes and Pets! MANAGE 5 Heroes at the SAME TIME. UPGRADE Heroes and EVOLVE Pets to become stronger! MEET every Hero and their SUPER-POWERS: LIGHT, VANPIRISM, FIRE, WIND or HEALING! UNLOCK every BUILDING and their UPGRADES! 23 unique LEVELS to PLAY! 50+ unique MONSTERS to KILL! DISCOVER the TALENT-TREE-SYSTEM and make your team STRONGER! DESTROY your enemies with ELEMENTAL GOLEMS, THUNDERBOLTS and much MORE! COME BACK everyday to get your DAILY PRIZE! ENJOY both the STORY MODE and the SURVIVAL MODE!
